p: The pH was measured with a Thermo-Fisher Scientific pH meter, previously calibrated with buffer solutions of pH 4, 7, and 10. The samples implemented for the five treatments consisted of 5 g of the fruits macerated and blended in an Oster Mod. 4655 and homogenized with 50 mL of distilled water (NTC 4103 [ 49]). Soluble solids were measured with a Milwaukee MA871 refractometer at 23 Â°C.
